explains: n. 评估，估价；评价；员工工作评估
wordGroup: performance appraisal 成绩评价，业绩评价
real estate appraisal 房地产评估；不动产评估
appraisal report 评估报告；[经]估价报告
land appraisal 土地评价，土地估价；土地鉴定
investment appraisal 投资评估；投资评价

sentences.en: She was honest in her appraisal of her team's chances.
sentences.cn: 她对自己队获胜机会的估计是诚实的。

sentences.en: It may also be necessary to get a new appraisal of the property.
sentences.cn: 可能还需要对该房产做个新的估价。

sentences.en: What is needed in such cases is a calm appraisal of the situation.
sentences.cn: 在此类情况下需要的是对形势的冷静估计。
